import React from 'react'; import './Profile.css' class Profile extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ name: this.props.user.name, age: this.props.user.age, pet: this.props.user.pet } } render(){ return (

{user.name}

{`Image Submitted: ${user.entries}`}

{`Member Since: ${new Date(user.joined).toLocaleDateString()}`}

×
); } } export default Profile;
